column5: does anyone know of a store or shop that is near ottawa or montreal that can get waxworms ???  id prefer a shop that will deliver im looking for 1000 waxies and 1000 maggots asap...  i would realy apreciate any help guys ...thanx

I've been through this.  There are companies that sell worms on-line, mainly as pet food.  You can order large quantities from them.  Make sure its a Canadian company as there seems to be an issue with shipping live worms over the border.  I can't remember the name of the company I ordered from but the worms showed up in good shape.  They were a little expensive.  Take the time to learn about providing the right conditions to store your worms (the fridge is too cold) or they'll die real quick.
I don't think this is the site I ordered from, but I can't find the other one.  http://www.capitaldragons.com/shop/feeder-area-wax-worms-c-17_25
ouch...75 bucks for  a thousand...its like 30 in the usa
Mike theres a thread on this board from not to long ago, that posted an ontario dealer.I cant find it.SRY
http://www.canadianfeeders.com/products/waxworms.html  1000/$55 for "members", membership is $25  Also take note, can you use 1000 waxworms in a month?
do the do retail or are they wholesale only?
maybe...but some buddies also want some...  ive caught 200 perch in one day by myself so you burn thew bat pretty quik..  i think i used over 2000 maggots last year and tons of crappie nibles
Here's the guy I use when I need worms, located in Georgetown but they ship country wide. Bait site: http://www.butterworms.ca/ Parent site: http://www.recorpinc.com/ Cheers Squiggs
thanks cosmos...so far this is the best price ive seen in canada...
